title: Riot FIX UR GOD DAMN MATCHMAKING SYSTEM PLEASE!
body:
Im legit trying to carry every god damn game but i cant with these feeders.And they are higher ranks than me?!?!?!Honestly im going to stop playing league until this issue is resolved.

In this game shown above the enemy team's nexus was wide open and they also had 4 of our turrets.But in the end as expected we lost.We even had baron buff that I GOT and these people cant even backdoor/defend.

FIX UR GOD DAMN GAME RIOT

replies.body: Follow up on this I also am bronze 2 and i was playing with and against diamond players and gold players makes no god damn sense
Follow up on the follow up, This is not the case for only one game this is almost every game.

You have a high mmr for your rank, so you will naturally play with higher ranked people, but you have to keep in mind that that is still elo hell. There are people that can't carry a winning game with 20 kills in that elo
